All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
collectionFragment
A Fragment for displaying a collection of viruses that the user has created or modified.
CustomizationCheckFragment
A Fragment for verifying and reviewing customization choices made by the user.
CustomizationFragment
Fragment that allows users to customize aspects of "enemies" within the app.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
This class performs instrumented unit tests, which execute on an actual Android device or emulator.
ExampleUnitTest
This class provides an example of a local unit test that can be executed on the development machine (host).
HomeFragment
A Fragment representing the home screen of the application.
HomepageFragment
A Fragment subclass that serves as the homepage for the application.
HomepageViewModel
ViewModel for the HomepageFragment.
LoginFragment
A Fragment subclass that provides login and registration functionalities using Firebase Authentication.
MainActivity
MainActivity serves as the entry point of the application, orchestrating the initial UI setup, navigation handling, and integration of Firebase services.
saveData
The saveData class manages the game data such as progress, customization, and levels.
saveDataTest
This class is used to test the saveData class to make sure it works properly.
StatsFragment
The StatsFragment class is responsible for displaying the statistics screen in the application.
virus_RecyclerViewAdapter
Adapter class for managing a RecyclerView that displays a list of viruses.
virus_RecyclerViewAdapter.MyViewHolder
ViewHolder class for the RecyclerView, holding references to the ImageView and TextView in each row.
virusModel
The virusModel class represents a data model for a virus in the application.
virusModelTest
This class is used to test the virusModel class to make sure it works properly.
